metadata.title: CVE-2008-5152 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - negligible
metadata.description: inmail-show in mh-book 200605 allows local users to overwrite arbitraryfiles via a symlink attack on a (1) /tmp/inmail#####.log or (2)/tmp/inmail#####.stdin temporary file.

criterions.comment: mh-book package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
